name: CMGT_Condition_EvaluationForTextFields
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!valueJson: if(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(
      value: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.valueJson]
    ),
    null,
    /*need to wrap in tostring as this returns any type*/
    tostring(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fromJson_v1"(
        ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.valueJson]
      ).value
    )
  ),
  local!runTimeValue: rule!CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_returnRuntimeValue(
    data: ri!data,
    field: ri!field
  ),
  local!formattedRunTimeValue: a!defaultValue(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_RejectBlank(
      a!flatten(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: local!runTimeValue,
          expression: a!defaultValue(
            trim(
              substitute(
                substitute(striphtml(fv!item), char(160), char(32)),
                char(10),
                char(32)
              )
            ),
            ""
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    ""
  ),
    a!match(
      value: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.operator],
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_INCLUDES,
      then: contains(
        local!formattedRunTimeValue,
        local!valueJson
      ),
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_DOES_NOT_INCLUDE,
      then: not(
        contains(
          local!formattedRunTimeValue,
          local!valueJson
        )
      ),
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_EQUAL_TO,
      then: local!valueJson = local!formattedRunTimeValue,
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_NOT_EQUAL_TO,
      then: local!valueJson <> local!formattedRunTimeValue,
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_CONTAINS,
      then: toboolean(
        search(
          local!valueJson,
          local!formattedRunTimeValue
        )
      ),
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_NULL,
      then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(value: local!formattedRunTimeValue),
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_NOT_NULL,
      then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(input: local!formattedRunTimeValue),
      default: false
    )
  
)
